h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
paragraph_content: You'll unlock Mysticism early on and be able to use Immobilize to stop enemies in their tracks. Skills like Stagnation, where you extend the duration of Immobilization the next time you use the spell are invaluable especially as they stack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees' and the sub-subsection 'Best Mysticism Skills to Unlock'.
The content is as follows:
You'll unlock Mysticism early on and be able to use Immobilize to stop enemies in their tracks. Skills like Stagnation, where you extend the duration of Immobilization the next time you use the spell are invaluable especially as they stack.

h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
paragraph_content:
Skill Name | Description   
---|---  
**Stagnation**|  Extends duration of Immobilization on next attack (Stacks up to 5-10 times)   
**Evanescence**|  When enemies attack after being Immobilized, the duration increases along with the damage they take   
**Raging Flames**|  Focus generates each second you're within the Ring of Fire   
**Consolidation**|  Slowly recover health while in the Ring of Fire.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees' and the sub-subsection 'Best Mysticism Skills to Unlock'.
The content is as follows:
Skill Name | Description   
---|---  
**Stagnation**|  Extends duration of Immobilization on next attack (Stacks up to 5-10 times)   
**Evanescence**|  When enemies attack after being Immobilized, the duration increases along with the damage they take   
**Raging Flames**|  Focus generates each second you're within the Ring of Fire   
**Consolidation**|  Slowly recover health while in the Ring of Fire.

h2_title: How to Understand the Early Game Skills Trees
paragraph_content: Finally, Mysticism is where you can control the first spell you’ll learn - Immobilize. This will improve the duration of the Immobilize effect, and allow you to cause more damage when attacking using this.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Early Game Skills Trees'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, Mysticism is where you can control the first spell you’ll learn - Immobilize. This will improve the duration of the Immobilize effect, and allow you to cause more damage when attacking using this.

h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
paragraph_content: Team this with Evanescence and you can extend the Immobilization once again, but also increase the damage they take once they try to attack. The goal for this category should be to try and do as much damage as possible and have the spell last as long as you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees' and the sub-subsection 'Best Mysticism Skills to Unlock'.
The content is as follows:
Team this with Evanescence and you can extend the Immobilization once again, but also increase the damage they take once they try to attack. The goal for this category should be to try and do as much damage as possible and have the spell last as long as you can.

h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
paragraph_content: Later on, you'll also earn Ring of Fire, which will help you recover quicker and can be used to protect against the cold. Skills like Raging Flames and Consolidation are worth unlocking here, to help you recover and build Focus simultaneously so you can jump back into the action as you exit the ring.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees' and the sub-subsection 'Best Mysticism Skills to Unlock'.
The content is as follows:
Later on, you'll also earn Ring of Fire, which will help you recover quicker and can be used to protect against the cold. Skills like Raging Flames and Consolidation are worth unlocking here, to help you recover and build Focus simultaneously so you can jump back into the action as you exit the ring.

The "Ring of Fire" skill tree includes a skill called "Raging Flames," which generates additional Focus every second while the player is within the Ring of Fire. The skill cannot be awakened as indicated by the message "Cannot Awaken," and the player currently has 0 out of 2 Sparks needed for awakening. The menu also includes navigation options for other categories such as Foundation, Staff Stances, Alteration, Strand, and Transformations.

img_summary: The image displays a section of a video game interface focused on a skill called "Cloud Step" under the "Alteration" category. The skill is described as a mobility spell that creates a decoy, allowing the player to disperse into mist and escape, useful for evading attacks or luring enemies into traps. It has an active duration of 35 seconds and costs 30 points. Additionally, upon returning from the mist state, the player can perform an "Unveiling Strike" to catch opponents off guard. The skill tree shows various interconnected nodes, indicating potential upgrades or related abilities.
